title: Robert Stevenson Lighting - Theo Metal and Conical Glass Flush Mount Ceiling Light
features: This modern ceiling light showcases a sleek 2-tone metal frame finished with a conical clear glass shade
Metal and glass flush mount ceiling light in a matte black and brushed nickel finish
Edison bulbs are ideal for creating a cozy, inviting atmosphere
Hardwiring required; Maximum 60W bulb not included
Light measures 9.75" L x 9.75" W x 8.5" H
description: Timeless and contemporary elements comprise the essence of the Theo collection; The modern torch form of the fixture is bisected by a sleek metal band that suspends the tapered glass shade in the minimalist canopy; Hang in a bedroom, foyer, dining room, kitchen, or living area for the ultimate combination of style and warmth
